job_description:
Data Scientist - Vodafone
Location: London, UK (Hybrid - 3 days office, 2 days remote) | Other
locations available: Manchester, Birmingham, Dublin Salary: £65,000 -
£85,000 (depending on experience) + performance bonus Visa
Sponsorship: Available for qualified candidates
Join Vodafone, a global leader in telecommunications and digital
services, where innovation meets impact. We're transforming how the
world connects, and we need exceptional data scientists to drive our
digital future.
About Vodafone
At Vodafone, we connect millions of people, businesses, and
communities worldwide. Our cutting-edge technology and data-driven
approach power everything from 5G networks to IoT solutions. We're not
just a telecom company – we're architects of the digital future, creating
solutions that matter.
Our Commitment to Diversity: With 40% of our tech workforce identifying
as women and active Employee Resource Groups including Pride,
Cultural Diversity Network, and Parents & Carers, we're building an
inclusive environment where everyone thrives.
The Opportunity
We're seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our 25-person Advanced
Analytics team within the Digital Innovation department. You'll help
unlock the power of data to revolutionize customer experiences and drive
business growth. Working with massive datasets, cutting-edge
technologies, and brilliant minds, you'll solve complex challenges in
telecommunications.
Current Team Impact:
Reduced customer churn by 23% through predictive modeling
Saved £12M annually through network optimization algorithms
Improved customer satisfaction scores by 18% via personalization
engines
What You'll Do
Ø=Ý9 D e v e l o p a n d i m p l e m e n t a d v a n c e d m a c h i n e l e optimize network performance and predict customer behavior
Ø=Ý9 A n a l y z e p e t a b y t e s o f n e t w o r k a n d c u s t o m e r actionable insights that drive strategic decisions
Ø=Ý9 B u i l d p r e d i c t i v e m o d e l s f o r c u s t o m e r c h u r n , revenue forecasting using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn
Ø=Ý9 C o l l a b o r a t e w i t h c r o s s - f u n c t i o n a l t e a m s i n c l product, and business stakeholders to deliver data-driven solutions
Ø=Ý9 D e s i g n a n d m a i n t a i n s c a l a b l e d a t a p i p e l i n e s infrastructure
Ø=Ý9 C r e a t e c o m p e l l i n g d a t a v i s u a l i z a t i o n s a n d p r communicate complex findings to technical and non-technical audiences
Ø=Ý9 L e a d A / B t e s t i n g i n i t i a t i v e s t o o p t i m i z e c u s t digital touchpoints
Ø=Ý9 M e n t o r j u n i o r t e a m m e m b e r s a n d c o n t r i b u t e science practice
Current Projects You'll Contribute To
Ø<ß¯ 5 G N e t w o r k I n t e l l i g e n c e : B u i l d i n g M L m o d e l s deployment and performance
Ø<ß¯ C u s t o m e r 3 6 0 P l a t f o r m : C r e a t i n g u n i f i e d c u s graph analytics and deep learning
Ø<ß¯ I o T A n o m a l y D e t e c t i o n : D e v e l o p i n g r e a l - t i m e millions of connected devices
Ø<ß¯ C o n v e r s a t i o n a l A I : E n h a n c i n g c u s t o m e r s e r v i and sentiment analysis
What We're Looking For
' M a s t e r ' s d e g r e e i n C o m p u t e r S c i e n c e , S t a t i s t i c related field (PhD preferred)
' 3 + y e a r s o f h a n d s - o n e x p e r i e n c e i n d a t a s c i e n c telecommunications or technology
' E x p e r t p r o f i c i e n c y i n P y t h o n , R , a n d S Q L w i t h e technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
' S t r o n g f o u n d a t i o n i n m a c h i n e l e a r n i n g a l g o r i t h m and deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras)
' E x p e r i e n c e w i t h c l o u d p l a t f o r m s ( A W S , A z u r e , o computing
' P r o v e n t r a c k r e c o r d o f d e p l o y i n g m o d e l s i n t o p using MLOps practices
' E x c e l l e n t p r o b l e m - s o l v i n g s k i l l s w i t h t h e a b i l i t y requirements
' O u t s t a n d i n g c o m m u n i c a t i o n s k i l l s w i t h t h e a b i l i technical concepts for diverse audiences
What Sets You Apart
Ø=ÜÊ E x p e r i e n c e w i t h t e l e c o m - s p e c i f i c d a t a s e t s ( data)
Ø=ÜÊ K n o w l e d g e o f 5 G t e c h n o l o g y a n d i t s d a t a i m Ø=ÜÊ P u b l i s h e d r e s e a r c h o r c o n t r i b u t i o n s t o o p e n Ø=ÜÊ E x p e r i e n c e w i t h r e a l - t i m e a n a l y t i c s a n d s t r e (Kafka, Flink)
What We Offer
Ø=Þ€ C o m p e t i t i v e s a l a r y p a c k a g e ( £ 6 5 , 0 0 0 - £ 8 5 , 0 performance-based bonuses
Ø=Þ€ C o m p r e h e n s i v e h e a l t h , d e n t a l , a n d v i s i o n c o family
Ø=Þ€ F l e x i b l e w o r k i n g a r r a n g e m e n t s : 3 d a y s o f f i c e Ø=Þ€ G e n e r o u s a n n u a l l e a v e ( 2 8 d a y s ) a n d s a b b a t Ø=Þ€ A c c e s s t o c u t t i n g - e d g e t e c h n o l o g y a n d £ 2 , 0 0 Ø=Þ€ C o n t i n u o u s l e a r n i n g o p p o r t u n i t i e s i n c l u d i n g certifications, and internal training programs
Ø=Þ€ C a r e e r d e v e l o p m e n t p a t h w a y s w i t h g l o b a l m o Ø=Þ€ E m p l o y e e s t o c k p u r c h a s e p l a n a n d 1 0 % r e t i r Ø=Þ€ W e l l n e s s p r o g r a m s a n d m e n t a l h e a l t h s u p p o r apps
Ø=Þ€ D i s c o u n t e d V o d a f o n e p r o d u c t s a n d s e r v i c e s Your Impact After One Year
By your first anniversary, you'll have:
Deployed at least 3 production-ready ML models improving key business
metrics
Reduced customer churn by measurable percentage through predictive
analytics
Optimized network efficiency resulting in cost savings
Established yourself as a trusted data expert within the organization
Contributed to strategic initiatives shaping Vodafone's digital
transformation
Interview Process
Timeline: 3-4 weeks from application to offer

2þ ã T e c h n i c a l a s s e s s m e n t ( t a k e - h o m e o r l i v e c o d 3þ ã V i r t u a l p a n e l i n t e r v i e w w i t h t e a m m e m b e r s ( 9 4þ ã F i n a l i n t e r v i e w w i t h d e p a r t m e n t h e a d ( 4 5 m i n 5þ ã R e f e r e n c e c h e c k s a n d o f f e r
Ready to Shape the Future of Connectivity?
If you're passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and
want to work at the forefront of telecommunications innovation, we want
to hear from you.
Application Deadline: July 4, 2025
Vodafone is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a
diverse and inclusive workforce. We welcome applications from all
qualified candidates regardless of race, gender, age, sexual orientation,
disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Join us in creating a better connected future for everyone.
#DataScience #MachineLearning #Telecommunications #HybridWork
#TechJobs #Vodafone #DataScientist #London #UK

rejection_reasons: Less than 3 years dedicated data-science experience, below Vodafone’s ideal range
No evidence of big-data tooling (Spark/Hadoop), cloud platforms, or MLOps deployment
Lacks telecommunications domain knowledge or large-scale network analytics exposure
key_strengths: Holds an MSc from LSE, demonstrating advanced analytical training
Hands-on experience building transformer-based NLP models and scalable data pipelines with Python & SQL
Experience communicating insights and working cross-functionally in ESG and business settings
candidates.experience_summary: Gül offers solid academic credentials and recent data-science work focused on NLP and ESG analytics. However, her limited tenure in data science, absence of cloud/MLOps and big-data tooling, and no telecom experience leave sizeable gaps against Vodafone’s expectations.

rejection_reasons: No postgraduate degree; lacks the Master’s level study preferred by Vodafone
CV does not reference SQL, big-data ecosystems, cloud platforms, or formal MLOps experience
No background in telecommunications or large-scale network data
key_strengths: Over 7 years of analytics experience including 4+ as a Data Scientist
Exposure to PyTorch and geospatial/cluster analysis, indicating applied machine-learning skills
Mathematics degree provides strong quantitative foundation
candidates.experience_summary: Jack brings substantial data-science tenure and familiarity with deep-learning frameworks, but the CV lacks evidence of cloud, big-data, or production MLOps experience and is missing telecom domain knowledge. These gaps keep his overall fit below Vodafone’s high bar.
